ingredients: 1 cup KRAFT Creamy Mexicana Shredded Cheese with a TOUCH OF PHILADELPHIA, divided
title: Creamy Taco Unstuffed Shells
instructions:
Heat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Cook pasta as directed on package, omitting salt.
Meanwhile, cook meat, onion, pepper, zucchini and taco seasoning mix in large skillet on medium-high heat until meat is evenly browned, stirring occasionally.
Drain pasta. Add to meat mixture along with tomatoes; stir. Bring just to boil. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and 1/2 cup cheese. Spoon into 13x9-inch baking dish sprayed with cooking spray.
Bake 20 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with remaining cheese; bake 3 to 5 minutes or until melted.
